title: Lower Dark Harvest's health requirement to 40%
body: So then it's harder to get stacks from merely poking a bit, and it can then have synergy with Coup de Grace

replies.body: How about lowering poke damage instead?
That'd be nice, across the board.  The problem isn't so much the poke damage, at least not what he is talking about here, so that doesn't really apply.

> [{quoted}](name=Cats Are Food,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=IAiEc8yn,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-12-23T02:20:24.479+0000)
>
> That'd be nice, across the board.  The problem isn't so much the poke damage, at least not what he is talking about here, so that doesn't really apply.

He's talking about how dark harvest stacks are is too easy to get with a bit of poke. 
Suggested was increasing the difficulty of proccing it. I suggest lowering poke damage, which fixes both this specific issue, as well as more general issues (especially in ARAM).

It doesn't really have any effect on gaining a stack at 50%, though.  It just means it MAY take you longer to get to that stack, at 50%.  I read his post as meaning that 50% is, in no way, considered low health for anything else in the game.

> [{quoted}](name=Cats Are Food,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=IAiEc8yn,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2018-12-23T02:28:28.821+0000)
>
> It doesn't really have any effect on gaining a stack at 50%, though.  It just means it MAY take you longer to get to that stack, at 50%.  I read his post as meaning that 50% is, in no way, considered low health for anything else in the game.

And I read it as it is too easy to get people to 50% with poke, how is that not clear.
At least we can find commonality of ground here.  Which means, ultimately, I agree with your point.

> [{quoted}](name=Ok sure but why,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=IAiEc8yn,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-12-23T02:18:48.339+0000)
>
> So then it&#039;s harder to get stacks from merely poking a bit, and it can then have synergy with Coup de Grace

That isn't synergy really.  That's just weakening it, it has just as much synergy now as it would then.

I think what they mean is this:

Most everything in the game works off the precept that "Low Health" is 30% or lower.  Except Dark harvest, for some reason.
But it isn't saying low health, it's saying half health.  I don't consider it low health, I consider it a threshold.
That's true.  I guess I got used to it while it required you to kill/assist, and was gone when it changed, so I am still thinking of it in terms of "Almost dead people."
dark harvest has been nerfed to a point i dont think it matters any more

Yeahhhh I sorta feel this.  It's too easy to dip someone down to 50 and then just toss a random, hardly annoying, AOE at them and grab a stack.

I'd say lower, though, much like many other Runes/Abilities, and set it at 30%.
